title: Billionaire Stan Druckenmiller: I Don’t Own Bitcoin but I Should
description: Renowned billionaire hedge fund manager Stanley Druckenmiller says he doesn’t own any bitcoin but he should. He sees the crypto as a brand. When comparing bitcoin to gold, he said: “It’s clear that the young people look at it as a store of value because it’s a lot easier to do stuff with.” Stan Druckenmiller […]

title: SBF trial day 17: FTX founder pitched as a criminal and a victim in closing arguments
description: Attorneys for the government and defense delivered their closing arguments in United States v Sam Bankman-Fried, the trial over FTX’s multi-billion dollar collapse where prosecutors allege that the founder built his crypto empire atop a “pyramid of lies”.
